name: The Forgotten Jungle
description:
A thrilling adventure where you will have to find the treasure you once lost in exchange for all your memories. Go further and further through this vast jungle and find all its secrets.

The Forgotten Jungle  is our first game in a jam and we are very happy and excited about the result. We hope to participate in the maximum jam possible to continue learning about making video games

Thanks to Global Game Jam and Malaga Game Jam for all.

Credits:
